Memorial Service Dark Elf Village and the Shilen Temple
We request those who have time to please visit the Dark Elf Village and the Shilen Temple to pay their respects for those who have died.
Find Priest Khyber in the Dark Elf Village and show your sympathy (Sorrow Emote) and then find Guard Janson in the Shilen Temple and perform a formal greeting (Bow Emote). That is all that is requested for this memorial service.
